description:
**** UPDATED MARCH 21st, 2016 **** NEW LECTURES ****

Need blog post ideas...?

Starting a blog is easy, but writing high quality content on a daily basis can be a challenge. It takes many hours sometimes even weeks to come up a great blog post that will get you the traffic, engagement and sales you need to keep your business alive online.

If you don't have a consistent stream of blog posts that are being published day-by-day, week-by-week and month-by-month, you cannot compete with those who are writing content that is shared, loved and engaged with.

Wouldn't it be nice, if you took your blog post idea or the topic you are talking about and could choose from 1 of 220 blog post ideas that you can just pick and start crafting your blog post that will take you only less than a few hours?

This course gives you an ultimate list of 220 blog post ideas that will let you conquer the blank page.

In this course I cover a solid list of useful strategies, techniques, and questions that can always keep a blogging idea on the tip of your tongue.

By the end of the course, you should be able to:

  1. Know the right way to write a blog post that puts your readers into focus
  2. Write posts that are useful for your readers that get your blog noticed on social media
  3. Connect with other blog influencers and have them promote your blog on their blog and social media.
  4. Create entertaining posts that will keep your readers laughing and sharing your posts all the way.
  5. Author newsworthy posts that compete with major news websites and be seen as an authority on a topic
  6. Talk about in yourself in a way that gets your readers attracted to your human side
  7. Make your posts go viral on the web and have millions of traffic to your website.
  8. How to take your blog posts and multiply them so you have hundreds of additional blog posts.
title: The Ultimate Guide to Writing Viral Blog Posts
